pages.title: Boline
pages.text:
The **Boline** is a multi purpose tool with many different unique abilities.\
      \
      **1.** It is used to cut various items on the Herbalist Bench \
      **2.** It can harvest crops when right-clicking them but wont destroy the crop block \
      **3.** It can cut herbs similar to crops \
      **4.** When a skeleton is killed with a boline it has a small chance of dropping a skull \

pages.title: Black Thorn Staff
pages.text:
The **Black Thorn Staff** is a powerful utility item that acts simillarly to a wrench from tech mods.\
      \
      It allows you to display information on blocks like an incense's range or change a Rune Slab's state
